actions.text: Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Clerk of the House to inform the President that the House of Representatives has elected Thomas P. O'Neill, a Representative from the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, Speaker; and Edmund L. Henshaw, a citizen of the Commonwealth of Virginia, Clerk.

summary.text: Notifies the President of the election of the Honorable Thomas P. O'Neill, Jr., of Massachusetts, as Speaker of the House of Representatives, and Edmund L. Henshaw, Jr., as Clerk of the House.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Clerk of the House to inform the President that the House of Representatives has elected Thomas P. O'Neill, a Representative from the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, Speaker; and Edmund L. Henshaw, a citizen of the Commonwealth of Virginia, Clerk.
